HTML5DevConf Autumn 2014

Moscone Center, San Francisco

Conference: October 20 & 21, 2014

Training: October 22, 23, & 24

Note that our speakers are in fact human, and as such, the schedule is subject to change for any number of unforseen circumstances including, but not limited to, illness, natural disasters, explosions, aliens, and skynet.

7:30am - 9:00am

Note that although registration is scheduled from 7:30am - 9:00am,
you can still register at anytime during the day.

Monday October 20

Registration

Tuesday October 21
